responsive_effect: (Once per turn) When we take card-effect damage: choose 1 card from our discard to add to hand.

introduction: [Persistent] The Prophet said nothing—only wrote a book.
effect: On the turn this card is removed from the field, we may use up to three additional Prophecies.
Additional summon 1 monster; attach this card under it as Mana.

responsive_effect: When our monster is targeted for destruction by an effect: negate that effect and view all cards in the opponent’s hand.

effect: All our monsters gain ATK +5 this turn.

responsive_effect: When the opponent draws a card: take that card or take 1 card from their hand.

effect: Deal 10 damage to the opponent.

introduction: The Prophet says there might be allies in this hole.
effect: Discard your entire hand; draw and reveal until you have drawn 2 monster cards.

responsive_effect: After we make an additional summon this turn: flip 1 of our face-up monsters face-down; then take 2 random cards from the opponent’s hand.

effect: Additional summon 1 Level 0 monster. All our monsters’ base ATK becomes the average of their base ATK (round up).

introduction: [Persistent] The Prophet found a hole like a black hole.
effect: At End Phase: you may place any number of monsters from hand or field onto this card. During Set phase: you may summon up to two from this card (first counts as Normal Summon, second as Additional Summon). (Cards placed on this card are not on the field.)

introduction: [Persistent] A once-kind goblin, slain by kin, became a spirit.
effect: After use, during our turns treat this as a monster: Spirit type, ATK 4, DEF 4.

introduction: “All in—what’s to fear?” says the Prophet.
effect: Any number of our attack-capable monsters perform a joint attack with combined ATK. The joint attack does not trigger any opponent effects. Those monsters cannot attack again this turn.

introduction: Someone must pay for prosperity, says the Prophet.
effect: Destroy 1 of our monsters; draw 3 cards.
Destroy 1 of our monsters. Choose another of our monsters: it gains ATK +5 and Mana + (1 + the destroyed monster’s Mana).

responsive_effect: When the opponent declares an attack: pay 1 Mana to negate the attack and destroy the attacker; if destroyed, we gain Faith +3.

effect: (Once per turn) Remove 2 Mana from our field (not from this card) to destroy 1 opponent card; then this card gains +1 Mana.
Remove 1 Mana from the field; swap this card with a Prophecy in the discard, then immediately use that Prophecy.
Equipped monster gains +1 Mana at each End Phase; if the opponent has no Set cards, gain +1 more.

responsive_effect: When an opponent card is flipped face-up: negate its effect and destroy that card.
At the end of our turn: deal 5 damage to the opponent.

effect: Remove 1 Mana from our field; treat as a monster (ATK 15 / DEF 0) that makes one attack. (If the opponent has no monsters or egg tokens, it may attack directly.)
Equipped monster gains the skill **[Hallucinate]**: gain control of an enemy monster for 1 turn (it counts as ours and may attack the player if allowed).
Move all Mana from both fields onto one of our monsters.
Equipped monster gets ATK +5, DEF +5. At each of our End Phases, remove 1 Mana from our field or destroy this card.
Mana +2, randomly distributed among our monsters.
All our monsters gain DEF +3.
Choose one of our monsters; it can attack two extra times this turn.
responsive_effect: When we declare an attack: another of our monsters gets ATK +10 for its next attack this turn.

introduction: The Prophet blows the horn at the perfect moment.
effect: This turn, ATK/DEF buffs on our monsters are doubled.
responsive_effect: When the opponent declares an attack: all our monsters gain DEF +5 this turn.

introduction: Who can refuse a cute kitty?
effect: Choose one of our Level ≤2 monsters; it attacks the opponent directly.

introduction: Heaven’s sanction foretells Mother Earth’s disdain.
responsive_effect: When a monster on the field is destroyed by battle: deal damage to the opponent equal to double its DEF.
When the opponent declares an attack: negate it; return a random face-up opponent card to their hand.

effect: Discard 1 card; bounce 1 opponent card to their hand.
responsive_effect: After an opponent monster finishes an attack: one of our monsters makes an attack.
At the end of our turn: name a card. If it is in the opponent’s hand or Set zone, they must discard it. Repeat naming until we miss.

introduction: An untimely chill and hunger arrive together.
responsive_effect: When the opponent’s last monster is destroyed: also destroy 2 of their hand cards or 1 Prophecy.

effect: (Only if no monsters are on the field) [Direct Summon] 1 Level ≤3 monster from the discard.

introduction: [Quick] The Prophet foretold your early arrival.
effect: Flip-summon 1 additional monster. That monster is unaffected by opponent card effects this turn.
During Set/placement, when summoning a high-level monster: required Mana −2.
Mana +1; if [Celestial], gain +1 more.
Additional summon 1 monster (Mana cost −1), then discard 1 random card.
Look at 1 Set card and 2 cards in the opponent’s hand; then return 1 Set card to their hand.
Discard 1 from hand (or 1 field card, or remove 1 Mana); draw 2 cards.
All our monsters gain Mana +1. Then all our monsters lose all Mana and gain ATK + (their spent Mana × 5).

responsive_effect: When our Mana is removed or spent: 1 opponent monster permanently loses all skills, traits, and effects.

effect: We take 10 damage; opponent takes 5 damage; one of our monsters gains Mana +3.
responsive_effect: When the opponent spends ≥2 Mana at once: opponent takes 20 damage; we take 5 damage.
When our hand card is discarded by a card effect: we gain 3 Mana, distributed freely among our field.

effect: Remove 2 Mana from our field and discard 1 card; then destroy 1 opponent field card.
responsive_effect: When a [Chain] occurs: this card gains 1 Mana.

effect: Choose 1 monster; its next attack gains ATK +15. After that attack, we lose Faith 5.
Choose 1 monster; it gains ATK +3, and the **battle damage** it deals this turn is doubled.

responsive_effect: When we draw via an effect: this turn our **battle damage** +10.
When one of our monsters is destroyed by battle: next turn all our monsters gain ATK + (that **battle damage** value).

effect: All our monsters gain ATK + (our number of monsters). All opponent monsters gain DEF + (their number of monsters). **Battle damage** we deal this turn is doubled.
Choose 1 of our monsters: it gains Mana +1 and ATK +5 on its next attack. After that attack: opponent takes effect damage equal to the battle damage, then draws 2 cards.

responsive_effect: When we take **battle damage**: discard X cards; draw (X + 2) cards.
After we deal any damage: this turn all **effect damage** the opponent takes is ×2.
When we take **effect damage**: negate that damage and inflict the same amount to the opponent.

When the attacked opponent monster is not destroyed by battle: if our attacker’s ATK > that target’s original DEF, destroy it; then recalc **battle damage** using its original DEF (treated as **effect damage**), and gain its Mana.

When our monster is destroyed by an effect: its Mana is not absorbed; attach that Mana to this card and keep this card temporarily. At end of turn: [Direct Summon] that monster to our field, return its Mana and give +1 extra Mana; then destroy this card and attach it as Mana to that monster.
When we draw a Monster: Faith −5; [Direct Summon] it. It is unaffected by opponent card effects this turn.
When we take effect damage: if <5, negate it and put 1 Mana on this card; if ≥5, reduce the damage by 5.

effect: If we control any monster, we may make two additional summons.

responsive_effect: When the opponent declares an attack: destroy 1 of our monsters; choose another of our monsters to gain ATK +15 and make an attack.
After the opponent’s attack resolves: destroy 1 opponent monster.
When our monster gains Mana: that monster’s next two attacks get ATK +2; this turn it may attack one extra time and use one extra skill.

effect: Choose 1 monster on the field: it gains ATK +10 until end of turn.
responsive_effect: When our monster is attacked: that monster gains DEF +10 until end of turn.

effect: (Activate only if we control exactly 3 monsters) Choose one:\n- Draw 3 cards.\n- Destroy all opponent Prophecies on the field.
responsive_effect: (Activate only if we control exactly 3 monsters) When the opponent declares an attack: change its target to any of our monsters; then return this card to Set (face-down).
After we summon a high-level monster (Lv>0): randomly destroy 1 face-up opponent card.

effect: Choose 1 opponent monster that has a [Normal Trait]; destroy it.
responsive_effect: When the opponent uses a Prophecy: if we control no other face-up Prophecies besides this, either negate and destroy that Prophecy, or destroy a different Prophecy.

effect: You may use 1 extra Set (non-Equipment, non-Persistent) Prophecy that has been Set since your last turn; its (non-responsive) effect resolves twice.
Equipped monster gains ATK +1, DEF +4.

responsive_effect: After we draw: the opponent guesses the card type (Monster/Prophecy).\n- If wrong: we may [Direct Summon] or use it.\n- If right: we may discard it and steal 1 card from the opponent’s hand or Set zone.

introduction: [Persistent] The Prophet said: behold, your ancestral grudge.
effect: Condition: Only if last turn one of our X-type monsters was destroyed by battle by a Y-type monster, you may face this up.
responsive_effect: When our X-type monster battles a Y-type monster: ATK +5.

effect: Choose a Level 0 [Fish] (or [Merfolk], or Water-type) monster; its next attack has ATK ×3.
Deal 5 damage to the opponent for each (face-up) monster we control.

responsive_effect: When we declare an attack: that attack gains ATK +3. That attack shall not trigger opponent effects, and is unaffected by opponent [Persistent] Prophecies. The attacking monster refreshes its skill usage limit this turn.
When the opponent declares an attack: negate that attack; the attacked monster may pay 1 Mana to destroy 1 opponent monster.

effect: (Cannot be used the turn it is flipped; and we must have at least 8 total cards in hand + field.) Discard all our field and hand cards; destroy all opponent field cards; then we draw 5 cards and return to our turn begins.
Opponent chooses and destroys 1 of our monsters. Then we draw until we have 5 cards in hand.
Gain 2 additional chances to summon monsters. At end of this turn, if they remain on the field, return them to hand.

responsive_effect: When the opponent declares an attack: negate it; the attacked monster can remove 1 Mana to deal 14 damage to the opponent.

effect: You may use 1 extra Prophecy afterwards. If that resolves successfully, flip and use 1 more Set Prophecy from the field.
responsive_effect: After a [Chain] occurs during our turn: Prophecy uses are unlimited this turn.

effect: Return 1 monster we control to our hand; then perform 1 Additional Summon (it may be the same monster).
responsive_effect: When the opponent declares an attack: redirect that battle damage to the opponent. At the end of this turn: [Direct Summon] that monster which was destroyed by that battle to our field; then inflict 5 damage to the opponent.

introduction: [Persistent/Equipment] Guided by the Prophet, a magic axe was found.
effect: Equipped monster’s attributes are negated and it cannot use skills. ATK/DEF + 4.
Equipped monster gets ATK +2, DEF +2.
responsive_effect: When our Faith decreases: the equipped monster gains +1 Mana.
When we take effect damage: discard the top card of our deck. \n- Monster: destroy 1 opponent Set (face-down) card. \n- Prophecy: inflict 20 damage to the opponent.

effect: Equip to a face-up monster. The equipped monster’s original [Attr] is replaced with this [RespAttr]: “When the equipped monster destroys a Set (face-down) monster: inflict 5 damage to the opponent and we recover 5 Faith.”
Destroy all opponent Set (face-down) Prophecies.

responsive_effect: When the opponent declares an attack on our monster: that attacked monster gains DEF +10 for that battle; then the opponent takes damage equal to (that monster’s current DEF − the attacker’s current ATK), if positive.

When we discard cards from hand: place those discarded cards to our field Set (face-down); choose 1 of our monsters— it immediately makes that many attacks (equal to the number of cards discarded); then we recover Faith equal to (number of attacks × 5).

effect: During the opponent’s next turn: negate all of their attack declarations against us.

responsive_effect: When the opponent activates a Prophecy, a monster trait, or a monster skill: negate that effect/skill.
After we destroy an opponent monster by battle: opponent loses 15 Faith.

effect: Privately look at the top 5 cards of our deck; choose 1 to add to hand; return the rest to the top of our deck in random order.
Opponent Faith −5; our Faith +5.
Look at all opponent Set (face-down) Prophecies and 2 random cards in their hand.
